ud8.8:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
ud8.8:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena visakhaya migaramatuya natta kalankata hoti piya manapa.
ud8.8:1.4: Atha kho visakha migaramata allavattha allakesa diva divassa yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud8.8:1.5: Ekamantam nisinnam kho visakham migaramataram bhagava etadavoca:
ud8.8:2.1: “Handa kuto nu tvam, visakhe, agacchasi allavattha allakesa idhupasankanta diva divassa”ti?
ud8.8:2.3: Tenaham allavattha allakesa idhupasankanta diva divassa”ti.
ud8.8:2.4: “Iccheyyasi tvam, visakhe, yavatika savatthiya manussa tavatike putte ca nattaro ca”ti?
ud8.8:2.5: “Iccheyyaham, bhagava, yavatika savatthiya manussa tavatike putte ca nattaro ca”ti.
ud8.8:3.1: “Kivabahuka pana, visakhe, savatthiya manussa devasikam kalam karonti”ti?
ud8.8:3.2: “Dasapi, bhante, savatthiya manussa devasikam kalam karonti;
ud8.8:3.10: dvepi, bhante, savatthiya manussa devasikam kalam karonti.
ud8.8:3.11: Ekopi, bhante, savatthiya manusso devasikam kalam karoti.
ud8.8:3.12: Avivitta, bhante, savatthi manussehi kalam karontehi”ti.
ud8.8:4.1: “Tam kim mannasi, visakhe, api nu tvam kadaci karahaci anallavattha va bhaveyyasi anallakesa va”ti?
ud8.8:4.3: Alam me, bhante, tava bahukehi puttehi ca nattarehi ca”ti.
ud8.8:5.1: “Yesam kho, visakhe, satam piyani, satam tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.2: yesam navuti piyani, navuti tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.3: yesam asiti piyani, asiti tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.4: yesam sattati piyani, sattati tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.5: yesam satthi piyani, satthi tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.6: yesam pannasam piyani, pannasam tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.7: yesam cattarisam piyani, cattarisam tesam dukkhani,
ud8.8:5.8: yesam timsam piyani, timsam tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.9: yesam visati piyani, visati tesam dukkhani,
ud8.8:5.10: yesam dasa piyani, dasa tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.11: yesam nava piyani, nava tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.12: yesam attha piyani, attha tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.13: yesam satta piyani, satta tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.14: yesam cha piyani, cha tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.15: yesam panca piyani, panca tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.16: yesam cattari piyani, cattari tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.17: yesam tini piyani, tini tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.18: yesam dve piyani, dve tesam dukkhani;
ud8.8:5.19: yesam ekam piyam, ekam tesam dukkham;
ud8.8:5.20: yesam natthi piyam, natthi tesam dukkham, asoka te viraja anupayasati vadami”ti.
ud8.8:6.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
